meanings.definition: To make something seem more glamorous or attractive than it really is.
meanings.sent1: She overglamorizes her social media posts to impress her followers.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover overglamorizes the lives of celebrities.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to overglamorize his old car with fake gold paint was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The movie overglamorizes the struggles of being a rockstar.
meanings.sent5: The advertisement overglamorizes the benefits of the skincare product.

meanings.definition: To exaggerate the glamour or attractiveness of something.
meanings.sent1: The author overglamorizes the protagonist's charm in the novel.
meanings.sent2: Some reality TV shows tend to overglamorize the lives of their participants.
meanings.sent3: The way she overglamorizes her cooking skills is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The travel brochure overglamorizes the beauty of the destination.
meanings.sent5: The fashion industry often overglamorizes the idea of perfection.
